skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep meditation music
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Meditation Music is the Alexa skill that lets you experience guided meditation sessions anytime you wish. Featuring over 10 different meditations, with a variety of voices and soothing background sounds, this skill is designed to help your body and mind relax.
The duration of meditation sessions can vary from 10, 20 and 30 minutes.

With the Pro Features you will access to :

• Professional meditation voices
• A variety of background sounds perfect for your sessions
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Continuously updated meditation paths
• Access to all available durations of meditations

We’d love to hear your feedback to help us improve and provide the best guided meditation experience.

Enjoy your relaxation!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
